abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the object’s transform is valid.
overview:
## Discussion

If this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the object’s transform currently matches the position and orientation of the real-world object it represents.

If this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the object is not guaranteed to match the movement of its corresponding real-world feature, even if it remains in the visible scene.

# isTracked

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the object’s transform is valid.

## Declaration

```swift
var isTracked: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the object’s transform currently matches the position and orientation of the real-world object it represents.

If this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the object is not guaranteed to match the movement of its corresponding real-world feature, even if it remains in the visible scene.
title: isTracked
